title: Ghosts of the Civil War - Best of Coast to Coast AM -  10/12/17
itunes:title: Ghosts of the Civil War - Best of Coast to Coast AM -  10/12/17
description:
George Noory and author Rich Newman discuss his research into sightings of ghosts and spirits who continue to haunt Gettysburg and other battlefields from the Civil War.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
